name: Hey I Need You To Jump In This Pit 347 Times
name_original: Hey I Need You To Jump In This Pit 347 Times
description:
A simple request that really shouldn't be fulfilled

"What inspired you to make this?"

When given the theme "The game is your enemy" my first instinct was to make something everyone would hate with passion.

"How long does the game take to complete?"

Too long.

"This isn't fun."

Yes, That's the point.
